Package com.accenture.horsefeeding.repository

Interface FeedingRecordRepository

All Superinterfaces:

  • Method Details

    • findLatestFeedingForHorse

      @Query("SELECT MAX(fr.feedingEnd) FROM FeedingRecord fr WHERE fr.horse.horseId = :horseId") Optional<LocalTime> findLatestFeedingForHorse(@Param("horseId") Long horseId)
      Finds the latest feeding time for a specific horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - The ID of the horse.
      Returns:
      The latest feeding time, if available.

    • getTotalConsumedAmountByHorseId

      @Query("SELECT SUM(fr.amountConsumed) FROM FeedingRecord fr WHERE fr.horse.horseId = :horseId") int getTotalConsumedAmountByHorseId(Long horseId)
      Calculates the total amount of food consumed by a specific horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - The ID of the horse.
      Returns:
      The total consumed amount.
